header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_SequenceProxyPullConsumer

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::SequenceProxyPullConsumer interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_sequence_pull_supplier(SequenceProxyPullConsumer, PullSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a supplier to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PullSupplier to the target object. If a connection already exists or the supplied client does not support the functions pull_structured_events and try_pull_structured_events an exception is raised.

func.name: suspend_connection(SequenceProxyPullConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Suspend the connection with the proxy

desc.p: If a connection exist, invoking this operation will suspend the connection until instructed otherwise. Otherwise, no client have been connected or this operation already have been invoked an exception is raised.

func.name: resume_connection(SequenceProxyPullConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Resume a previously suspended connection with the proxy

desc.p: If an connection have been suspended this operation must be used to resume the connection. If the connection already is active or no client have been connected an exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_sequence_pull_consumer(SequenceProxyPullConsumer) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: This operation close the connection to the client and terminates the target object.
